    float seconds;
    cout << "Enter the delay time, in seconds:";
    cin >> seconds;
    clock_t delay = seconds * CLOCKS_PER_SEC; // 

    cout << "delaying..." << endl;
    clock_t start = clock();
    while (clock() - start < delay); // 

    cout << "done!" << endl;
```

#### 6.4 
c++fistream/fostreamcincout

```
#include <fstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#define IFILE "Avg.in"
#define OFILE "Avg.out"
#define NAMESIZE 1024

int main(void)
{
    using std::cout, std::cin, std::endl, std::vector;
    std::ofstream outFile;
    std::ifstream inFile;
    vector<double> data;
    double temp, res = 0.0;

    outFile.open(OFILE); // cincoutfsteam
    inFile.open(IFILE);

    if (!inFile.is_open() || !outFile.is_open()) // is_open
    {
        cout << "Unable to open "
        << IFILE << " or "
        << OFILE << endl;
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); // 
    }

    while (inFile >> temp) // 
    {
        data.push_back(temp);
        res += temp;
    }

    if (inFile.eof()) // 
    {
        if (data.size() == 0)
            cout << "No value readed!" << endl;
        else
        {
            cout << data.size() << " value" << (data.size() > 1 ? "s " : " ") << "readed" << endl;
            cout << "The avg is: " << res / data.size() << endl;
            cout << "Now putting results to " << OFILE << endl;

            // cin/cout
            outFile << data.size() << " value" << (data.size() > 1 ? "s " : " ") << "readed" << endl;
            outFile << "The avg is: " << res / data.size() << endl;

            outFile.close();
            inFile.close();
            exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); // 
        }
    }
    else if (inFile.fail())
        cout << "Type dismatch!" << endl;
    else
        cout << "Unknown Error!" << endl;

    outFile.close();
    inFile.close();
    exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
}
```

```
    string fName; //
    string lName;
    string description{"description: "} // ;
    string container;

    cout << "Enter your first name and last name:" << endl;
    getline(cin, fName), getline(cin, lName);
    // cinstringgetline

    cout << "Enter your desciption" << endl;
    getline(cin, container);
    description += container; // 

    cout << "your name is: " << fName << " " << lName << endl;
    cout << description << endl;
    cout << description[2] << endl;
```

`ctime`clock_tCLOCK_PER_SECOND
ctime
```
    float seconds;
    cout << "Enter the delay time, in seconds:";
    cin >> seconds;
    clock_t delay = seconds * CLOCKS_PER_SEC; // 

    cout << "delaying..." << endl;
    clock_t start = clock();
    while (clock() - start < delay); // 

    cout << "done!" << endl;
```

#### 6.4 
c++fistream/fostreamcincout

```
#include <fstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#define IFILE "Avg.in"
#define OFILE "Avg.out"
#define NAMESIZE 1024

int main(void)
{
    using std::cout, std::cin, std::endl, std::vector;
    std::ofstream outFile;
    std::ifstream inFile;
    vector<double> data;
    double temp, res = 0.0;

    outFile.open(OFILE); // cincoutfsteam
    inFile.open(IFILE);

    if (!inFile.is_open() || !outFile.is_open()) // is_open
    {
        cout << "Unable to open "
        << IFILE << " or "
        << OFILE << endl;
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); // 
    }

    while (inFile >> temp) // 
    {
        data.push_back(temp);
        res += temp;
    }

    if (inFile.eof()) // 
    {
        if (data.size() == 0)
            cout << "No value readed!" << endl;
        else
        {
            cout << data.size() << " value" << (data.size() > 1 ? "s " : " ") << "readed" << endl;
            cout << "The avg is: " << res / data.size() << endl;
            cout << "Now putting results to " << OFILE << endl;

            // cin/cout
            outFile << data.size() << " value" << (data.size() > 1 ? "s " : " ") << "readed" << endl;
            outFile << "The avg is: " << res / data.size() << endl;

            outFile.close();
            inFile.close();
            exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); // 
        }
    }
    else if (inFile.fail())
        cout << "Type dismatch!" << endl;
    else
        cout << "Unknown Error!" << endl;

    outFile.close();
    inFile.close();
    exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
}
```
